import{dateTimeConvert}from'./helpers';export function chartDataHelper(input){var arrHead=[['','Price USD']];var priceAndTimeData=[];var everyNthNum=function everyNthNum(arr,nth){return arr.filter(function(e,i){return i%nth===nth-1;});};var nthNumber=1;// 6
if(input.length<13){nthNumber=1;};everyNthNum(input,nthNumber).map(function(el){return priceAndTimeData.push([dateTimeConvert(el.time),el.price]);});return arrHead.concat(priceAndTimeData);};
